overview: Reminiscent of the film The Sound of Music, Bing Slamet works for Eddy Sudâ€™s family, who has many children. Bing wins their heart with his singing talent. The movie is filled with messages of tourism promotion and family planning, but there is also humour, since the Kwartet Jaya comedy group are part of the cast.
title: Bing Slamet Sibuk
